text:
The actor Sanogawa Ichimatsu (1722-1762) as Karigane Bunshichi in the play "Gonin otoko kariba no kado ide" 五人男狩場首途, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the third lunar month of 1756.
Right sheet of a diptych, the other is illustrated in Mutō, Shoki ukiyoe to kabuki (2005), no. 1473, fig. 107.
title: Actor Sanogawa Ichimatsu as Karigane Bunshichi
